import { useState } from "react" import { addListener } from "../../../../models/user"; const ProductModal= () =>{ const [design,setDesign] = useState(); const [desc,setDesc] = useState(); const [prix,setPrix] = useState(); const [qte,setQte] = useState(); const [cat,setCat] = useState(); const add=()=>{ dispatchEvent(addProduct({design,desc,prix,qte,cat})) } return (
setDesign(e.target.value)} /> setDesc(e.target.value)} /> setPrix(e.target.value)} /> setQte(e.target.value)} /> setCat(e.target.value)} />
) } export default ProductModal
